title: Reading List | #3 - 'The Sympathy of Things'
itunes:title: Reading List | #3 - 'The Sympathy of Things'
description: My third architectural book recommendation is 'The Sympathy of Things' by Lars Spuybroek. Here I talk in more detail about this book and what makes it essential reading for all architects and architecture students.
